oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Crystal structure of 4,6-O-ethylidene-N-(2-hydroxybenzylidene)beta-D-glucopyranosylamine
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SAH, AK
RAO, CP
SAARENKETO, PK
RISSANEN, K
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: saccharide moiety
h-1 nmr studies
lattice structure
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: 4,6-O-Ethylidene-N-(2-hydroxybenzylidene)-beta-D-glucopyranosylamine was synthesized and characterized using analytical, spectral and single-crystal X-ray diffraction methods. The anomeric nature of the saccharide moiety was proposed based on H-1 NMR studies and was confirmed by the crystal structure. The lattice structure of this compound was compared with that of its analogues. (C) 2002 .
